faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.a1: Our specialized technical team performs the installation on your vessel, usually in 2-4 hours. The process is non-invasive and does not affect the vessel's warranty.
faq.a2: SAFEBOAT is compatible with most vessels with 12V or 24V electrical systems. Our team makes a prior assessment to ensure total compatibility.
faq.q3: What happens if I sell my vessel?
faq.a3: The hardware can be transferred to a new vessel or you can cancel the service. The device remains on bailment throughout the period of use.
faq.q4: How are my navigation data protected?
faq.a4: We use end-to-end encryption and secure cloud servers. Your data is private and never shared with third parties.
faq.a5: The hardware has an estimated lifespan of 10 years and is on bailment. Any defect or problem is fully covered by the service.
